answer.value: Biometric authentication verifies your identity at using your unique physical characteristics, like your fingerprint or face and enables you to log in to Resident Portal without typing in a password.  Android phones have Fingerprint ID or Face ID to enable log in and iPhones have either Face ID or Touch ID.

values.value: Check that your mobile phone has the necessary hardware and that biometrics are enabled in your phone's settings.
If your biometric data hasn't been saved to your phone yet, follow the prompts to scan and register your face.
Enable Biometric Log In in the Resident Portal app
Tap on "Secure Authentication" and follow the on-screen instructions to set it up.

answer.value: Once set up, you can use biometric authentication to unlock the Resident Portal App. Simply use your registered biometric (fingerprint or face) to unlock the app instead of entering a password.
